org.ligoj.app.resource.plugin

Class PluginsClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • org.ligoj.app.resource.plugin.PluginsClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class PluginsClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    Class Loader which load jars in "plugins" directory inside the home directory.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String EXPORT_DIR
      Plug-ins export directory inside the home property
      static java.lang.String HOME_DIR_FOLDER
      Default home directory part used in addition of system user home directory : "/home/my-user" for sample.
      static java.lang.String HOME_DIR_PROPERTY
      System property name pointing to the home directory.
      static java.lang.String PLUGINS_DIR
      Plug-ins directory inside the home property

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      PluginsClassLoader()
      Initialize the plug-in URLClassLoader and the related directories.

                   throws java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PluginsClassLoader getInstance()
        Return the plug-in class loader from the current class loader.
        Returns:
        the closest PluginsClassLoader instance from the current thread's ClassLoader. May be null.

      • getInstance

        public static PluginsClassLoader getInstance(java.lang.ClassLoader cl)
        Return the plug-in class loader from the given class loader's hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        cl - The ClassLoader to inspect.
        Returns:
        the closest PluginsClassLoader instance from the current thread's ClassLoader. May be null.

      • toExtendedVersion

        public static java.lang.String toExtendedVersion(java.lang.String version)
        Convert a version to a comparable string and following the semver specification. Maximum 4 version ranges are accepted.
        Parameters:
        version - The version string to convert. May be null
        Returns:
        The given version to be comparable with another version. Handle the 'SNAPSHOT' case considered has oldest than the one without this suffix.
        See Also:
        toExtendedVersion(String)

      • toFile

        public java.io.File toFile(Subscription subscription,
                           java.lang.String... fragments)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Get a file reference for a specific subscription. This file will use the subscription as a context to isolate it, and using the related node and the subscription's identifier. The parent directory is created as needed.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription used a context of the file to create.
        fragments - The file fragments.
        Returns:
        The file reference.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the file creation failed.
